issue.title: [Java][Doc] Add missing information to docs on dictionary encoding
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17833](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17833). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The documentation (see: vector.rst) fails to say what value to use for the DictionaryEncoding id, and why. This should be included.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17833?focusedCommentId=17609025) by Larry White (ljw1001):*
This was merged into the PR for 17811
